REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0431 reute b f BC-TREASURY-CORP-OF-NSW 04-13 0098

TEXT.TITLE: TREASURY CORP OF NSW ISSUES AUSTRALIAN DLR BOND
TEXT.BODY: The New South Wales Treasury Corporation is issuing a 100 mln Australian dlr eurobond due May 27, 1992 paying 14-1/4 pct and priced at 101-7/8 pct, lead manager County Natwest Capital Markets said. The non-callable bond is guaranteed by the crown-in-right of New South Wales. The selling concession is 1-3/8 pct while management and underwriting combined pays 5/8 pct. The issue is available in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 Australian dlrs and will be listed in Luxembourg. The payment date is May 27. REUTER
